sentences.sentence: He was undeserving of her affections.
There are many undeserving rich—overpaid chief executives, for instance.
sentences.translation: 比如，有很多不值得富有却薪酬过高的首席执行官。

sentences.sentence: The press has surely been another party undeserving of our support.
sentences.translation: 新闻界是不值得我们支持的另一方。
